Package it.polimi.ingsw.view.cachemodel.cachedmap

Class FileRead

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.ingsw.view.cachemodel.cachedmap.FileRead
  • public class FileRead
extends java.lang.Object
    Helpers Class to read the CLI map from a file using a defined character convetion The Map is read from a file and populates a matrix of char, which can then be manipulated to update the players and other objects inside the map to have an interactive version of the CLI map

      • genRandInt

        private static int genRandInt​(int lower,
                              int upper)
        generate a random int with a lower and upper bound to place the player inside a random position in one cell of the char matrix
        Parameters:
        lower - lower bound of rand int returned
        upper - upper bound of the rand int returned
        Returns:
        an integer between lower and upper bound
